Object Support

Classes

interface  Copyable
 <<eXtension>> <<interface>> Interface for all the user-defined data type classes that support copy. More...
class  ObjectHolder
 <<eXtension>> Holder of object instance More...

Detailed Description

Object related items.

A user-defined type class implements this inteface to indicate that the class can be copied. This is typically used in com.rti.dds.topic.example.FooDataReader.take_next_sample or com.rti.dds.topic.example.FooDataReader.read_next_sample.
